Room.Name: Oceanview Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceanview Drive, east of Dillsdale Memorial Park.
Room.LongDescription: Dillsdale Memorial Park is located to the west of Oceanview Drive. This large park is used by the officals of Oceancrest for parties, invitationals, or just public gatherings. Dillsdale can also be used for making public announcements and other informative uses. The park is opened to the public, and reservable for weddings and other religious activities so long as it doesn't interfere with the lawn golf tournaments.
